sentence: Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina appears to have violated a federal conflict-of-interest law by failing to report his stake in a cryptocurrency named for the anti-Joe Biden slogan "Let's Go Brandon."
author: Kimberly Leonard
title: GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn appears to have violated the STOCK Act by failing to disclose 'let's go brandon' cryptocurrency purchase

sentence: Sen. Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) Wednesday called for an investigation by the House Ethics Committee into Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) over allegations that Cawthorn violated federal insider trading laws.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Tillis calls for investigation of Cawthorn over insider trading allegations

sentence: Just In... Sen. Thom Tillis called on the House Ethics Committee to investigate allegations that his fellow North Carolina Republican, Rep. Madison Cawthorn, engaged in an insider trading scheme.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Thom Tillis calls for investigation into Madison Cawthorn insider trading allegations

sentence: Republican Senator Thom Tillis has called for Congress to conduct a bipartisan investigation of his House colleague, Rep. Madison Cawthorn, over the latter's undeclared cryptocurrency purchases.
author: Cheryl Teh
title: North Carolina GOP senator calls for Madison Cawthorn's cryptocurrency purchases to be investigated by House Ethics Committee

sentence: Just In... Sen. Thom Tillis has unleashed a fresh round of attacks on his fellow North Carolina Republican lawmaker, Rep. Madison Cawthorn.

title: Thom Tillis continues attacks on fellow North Carolina Republican Madison Cawthorn

sentence: Madison Cawthorn (@CawthornforNC) April 29, 2022 Cawthorn, 26, went on to maintain that he "looked damn good on that cruise ship," apparently referring to now-viral photos of him wearing women's lingerie on a cruise ship that were leaked to the press last week.
author: Aila Slisco
title: 'Pathetic': Madison Cawthorn Responds to Ethics Complaint Over Conduct
